meanings.definition: The act of sending unsolicited messages or advertisements over the internet.
meanings.sent1: Receiving too many spammings can be annoying for internet users.
meanings.sent2: The company's website was shut down due to spammings flooding their inbox.
meanings.sent3: The spammings were like a never-ending stream of unwanted messages.
meanings.sent4: Her inbox was a battlefield, with spammings attacking from all sides.
meanings.sent5: The spammings were like a swarm of digital pests invading her email.

meanings.definition: Excessive or repetitive posting of irrelevant or inappropriate content.
meanings.sent1: The forum moderators had to deal with spammings cluttering the threads.
meanings.sent2: His social media account was suspended for spammings of offensive content.
meanings.sent3: The spammings of cat memes were cute but overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: The spammings of irrelevant posts drowned out the important discussions.
meanings.sent5: She felt like she was drowning in a sea of spammings on her feed.

meanings.definition: The practice of sending unwanted emails in bulk.
meanings.sent1: His email server crashed due to the spammings clogging up his inbox.
meanings.sent2: She had to set up a filter to block the spammings from reaching her.
meanings.sent3: The spammings of discount offers were tempting but overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: The spammings of newsletters flooded her inbox like a tidal wave.
meanings.sent5: He felt like he was buried alive under an avalanche of spammings.
